multisend_allows_distribute: Multisend.org allows you to distribute ERC-20 tokens to multiple wallet addresses with a single transaction fee.
the_most_commonly: The most commonly used aidrop method - this will send/push all of your transactions and the recipients will receive them automatically
airdrop_recipients: Airdrop recipients claim there airdrop rewards and pay the fee to transfer to there wallet - all unclaimed tokens remain in the airdrop owners wallet.
multisend_allows_send: Multisend.org allows you to send ERC20 tokens to thousands of addresses in 3 simple steps.
you_can_send: You can send ERC20 tokens to multiple addresses in 3 simple steps. 1, upload CSV 2, Approve 3, Send tokens
can_i_send: Can I test this before sending?
you_can_test: Yes you can test this tool using any of the following Networks before using on main net
multisend_uses_smart: Multisend.org uses Smart contracts to you can view the Multisend.org code on our Github here
you_can_save_money: You can save money on the Multisend platform fees by purchasing Credits in advance. These credits are added to your Ethereum address. Next time you visit the platform and sign in from this address you will see the number of credits you have available
credits_cover_the_platform: *Credits cover the platform fee only - you will still need to provision for Ethereum network gas fees.
credits_can_take: *Credits can take up to 24 hours to be applied to your account.
how_long_until: How long until the credits are applied to my account?
credits_will_be_added: Credits will be added to your account within 24 hours of purchasing
can_i_move: Can I move my credits to another address?
you_can_move: Absolutely! You can move unused credits to another Ethereum address - you will need to contact us using the ‘Contact’ form and await further instruction.
what_is_difference: What is the difference between Push and Pull?
this_is_the_most: This is the most commonly used airdrop method - this will send  all of your transactions and the recipients will receive them automatically
airdrop_recipients_2: Airdrop recipients claim their airdrop rewards and pay the fee to transfer to their wallet - all unclaimed tokens remain in the airdrop owner’s wallet.
total_number_of_tokens: Total number of tokens to send
